price: 91. Il se faufila vers leurs divinités et leur dit : « Ne mangez-vous donc pas ?
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
